articles.title: Chris Weidman leg destruction at UFC 261 should mark the end of his ‘All American’ career - MMA Mania
articles.description: Chris Weidman leg break should lead to the end of his MMA career after losing his Uriah Hall fight at UFC 261 on April 24 in Jacksonville, Florida.
articles.content:
UFC 261 was about as violent as it gets.

articles.author: Joe Bernstein
articles.title: Manchester United hope they can convince Cavani to stay by ending this campaign with a trophy - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ole Gunnar Solskjaer knows the Uruguayan striker is keen on returning to South America having endured a difficult year in England off the pitch because of Covid restrictions.
articles.content:
Manchester United are hopeful they can still persuade Edinson Cavani to stay at Old Trafford by winning a trophy this season.
Ole Gunnar Solskjaer knows the Uruguayan striker is keen on returning to… [+2026 chars]

articles.title: US ex-cop Chauvin to be sentenced 16 June for George Floyd murder - News24
articles.description: Sacked US police officer Derek Chauvin will be sentenced on June 16 for the murder of African American George Floyd in a case that sparked nationwide anti-racism protests.
articles.content:
• The sentencing for sacked US police officer Derek Chauvin has been set for 16 June, and he may face up to 40 years in prison.

articles.title: Iconic McDonald's outlet in Ridout Tea Garden to shut in December after 32 years in operation - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A 32-year-old McDonald's outlet in Ridout Tea Garden will be closing its doors in December. A spokesman for the American fast food chain told The Straits Times on Friday (April 23) that the outlet will cease operations upon the expiry of its lease…
